sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import { Heart, Star } from '../icons/Icons'; const ProductCard = ({ product }) => (
{product.isSpecial && ( Only )}
{product.brand}
{product.badges.map((badge, index) => ( {badge} ))}

{product.name}

{product.discount}% {product.price.toLocaleString()}원 {product.originalPrice.toLocaleString()}원
{product.rating} 리뷰 {product.reviews.toLocaleString()}
{product.specialDelivery && (
오늘출발 {product.deliveryTime}
)}
); export default ProductCard;
